document_data.name: Spell-Lord's House
document_data.text: Only by the whims of our great [[Azuth|god of wizardry]].
document_data.source: A [[cleric]] of [[Azuth]] when asked how the colors of the eastern window of the temple changed colors.<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
document_data.mainbody: The temple was a beautiful six-story structure. Its most notable feature was its eastern wall, which contained a massive, {{SIAdj|50|feet|adj=diameter}} [[wikipedia:Rose window|rose window]], with panes composed not of glass but of permanent [[illusion|illusory]] colors. These colors constantly swirled about.<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
document_data.Location: The Spell-Lord's House was located in [[Calimport/Quill Ward#Hapij Sabban|Fikra Drudach of Hapij Sabban]] within [[Calimport/Quill Ward|Quill Ward]].<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
document_data.Structure:
{{fq
| text   = Only by the whims of our great [[Azuth|god of wizardry]].

The temple was a beautiful six-story structure. Its most notable feature was its eastern wall, which contained a massive, {{SIAdj|50|feet|adj=diameter}} [[wikipedia:Rose window|rose window]], with panes composed not of glass but of permanent [[illusion|illusory]] colors. These colors constantly swirled about.<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
document_data.Interior: The Spell-Lord's House contained one of the oldest [[monasteries]] to the High One in [[Faer√ªn]]<ref group="note" name="age">For reference, the [[Sixth Age of Calimshan]] ended ''circa'' {{Yearlink|450}}, and the mortal [[Azuth]] obtained apotheosis ''circa'' {{Yearlink|263}}. and one of the best libraries in the city that was not privately owned.<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
document_data.History: The temple was first constructed at the end of the [[Sixth Age of Calimshan]]<ref group="note" name="age" /> but had been rebuilt at least four additional times.<ref name=Calimport-p56 />
